Since the question is asking about the likelihood of two separate events, I'll focus on the probabilistic models and ignore the narrative context.

Option (b) states that Mark would continue training to increase his pull-up count beyond ten to achieve a new goal of twenty pull-ups. This is a conjunction of two events: Mark continuing to train and achieving a new goal of twenty pull-ups.
